Posts.Content: Hello,  I had a mastectomy on Dec 22, 06. my daughter has been writing to you her name is Michelle B.  I had the tran flap done i have had a lot of drainage to they kept my drains in for around two weeks. but i was also draining out around the drain lines two, and i"m still have drainage yet it is starting to slow down but i have a lot of presser in my new breast.  My name is Carole P if you would like to e=mail me  i would e-mail back to  you  --- Message edited by CancerCompass staff: for personal protection, email address removed.  Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html ----
Posts.Title: Excessive drainage after simple mastectomy
